cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Leadership?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss how our solutions can help you build the executive team your organization needs to thrive in the digital age.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: At DAYONE, we believe that every great impact begins with the energy of the first day — and that true transformation happens when that energy is renewed, every single day. We focus on identifying leaders who don't just adapt — they drive the evolution of our clients.

fernanda.title: Managing Partner
fernanda.description:
Fernanda Amorim brings over 20 years of experience in executive search, with a strong track record leading more than 400 projects, and a reputation of delivering tailored, high-impact solutions with assertiveness and a sharp insight into digital transformation and human connections.
She built her career in global firms such as KPMG, Michael Page, Page Executive, Oracle, and Indeed, where she developed deep expertise in business strategy and strategic hiring, as well as consultative B2B leadership.
Most recently, as a Sr. Executive Partner at FIND HR, she led top management recruitment across players in tech, telecom and digital and championed diversity in leadership.

claudio.title: Managing Partner
claudio.description:
With over 20 years of experience in the technology sector, acquired at companies such as SAP and IBM, Claudio Guerreiro built a solid career as an executive before becoming an entrepreneur and entering the executive search market, where he worked as a partner at renowned consultancies such as 2Get and Heidrick & Struggles, in addition to being a board member of innovative companies.
At FIND HR, he led the company's strategic expansion, expanding its service offering and strengthening its presence in executive recruitment for technology and digital transformation roles.
His approach combines deep industry knowledge with a strong results-oriented mindset, focusing on assertiveness and excellence in executive recruitment.

carla.title: Associate
carla.description:
Carla has over 15 years of experience in executive recruitment, with a strong focus on leadership and senior management roles. She is recognized for her ability to deliver highly accurate, tailored solutions by combining business acumen, deep market knowledge, and a human-centered approach to professional connections.
She built her career in specialized recruitment consultancies and executive search firms, working with companies such as Michael Page, Hays, Robert Walters, FIND, and Vyborny’s Consulting. She has contributed to strategic projects for major groups in the technology, industrial, and retail sectors.
Throughout her career, she has developed expertise in building high-performance teams and supporting companies during moments of transformation, growth, or restructuring—always with a focus on strategic leadership and diversity. Her work emphasizes innovation, agility, and real business impact.

roberta.title: Associate
roberta.description:
An experienced professional with over 10 years in recruitment and selection, Roberta has a strong track record in strategic and leadership roles. Throughout her career, she has developed solid expertise in attracting, selecting, and developing talent for mid- and senior-level positions, directly contributing to the formation of high-performance teams and the strengthening of organizational culture in major companies.
Her experience includes working as a Manager at Calzedonia Group, a global Italian retail company, where she led recruitment processes and market mapping initiatives. In addition, she has collaborated with specialized recruitment consultancies, delivering strategic projects for leading groups in the retail, industrial, and technology sectors—always focused on results, agility, and excellence in delivery.
She is recognized for her analytical mindset, organizational diagnostic skills, and ability to align professional profiles with the unique needs of each business.

osvaldo.title: Thought Leader
osvaldo.description:
Osvaldo Aranha is recognized as one of the 100 best AI professionals in the world by PixieBrix and has worked in the information technology sector for over 18 years. He holds an MBA in Business Intelligence and specializations in IT Management, Futures Studies, and AI.
He has decades of experience in AI, Analytics, Cloud, Innovation, and Digital Transformation. He is an AI specialist, having led departments at Microsoft, Deloitte, and CSU Digital.
Since 2014, he has taught classes, courses, and training, supporting more than 6,000 executives through extensive courses, webinars, innovation projects, lectures, and in-person and online training. He mentors startups and also writes articles and publications on IT-related topics.

gustavo.title: Thought Leader
gustavo.description:
Gustavo Brant has over 30 years of experience as an executive in the B2B technology market, working with hardware, software, and services. He built a solid career leading operations at companies such as SAP, Oracle, IBM, Dell, and others, and most recently as Senior Vice President of DocuSign LATAM and Chief Growth Officer at Sankhya. He has received numerous recognitions, including eight President's Club honorees throughout his career.
Recognized for his ability to accelerate challenging businesses and develop high-performance teams, he spearheaded DocuSign's expansion in the region, developing a go-to-market plan that drove growth and exponentially scaling the team to market leadership. At Sankhya, he consistently exceeded targets, driving strategic restructuring that leveraged growth and transformation of both the internal structure and the partner ecosystem.
His leadership style is marked by strategic vision, excellent execution, and a strong focus on results in transformative contexts. His experience developing people has transcended hierarchical boundaries and includes several mentoring cases that have transformed the performance of business executives, especially in the technology industry.

cookies.title: Cookie Preferences
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. Choose your preferences below or accept all to continue.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Required for basic site functionality. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website through Google Analytics.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites for marketing and advertising purposes.

cookies.footer: You can change your preferences anytime in our

information.title: Information We Collect
information.description: Learn what information we collect and how.
information.intro: We may collect the following information from users:
information.browsing: Browsing data (e.g., IP address, browser type, pages visited)

purpose.title: Purpose of Data Use
purpose.description: Understand how we use your data.
purpose.intro: The data collected has the following purposes:
purpose.responding: Responding to requests made by users
purpose.improving: Improving the browsing experience on the website
purpose.communications: Sending relevant communications (when authorized by the user)

sharing.title: Sharing Data
sharing.description: Know when and how we share information.
sharing.intro: Your personal data will not be sold or shared with third parties, except:
sharing.legal: When necessary to comply with legal obligations
sharing.services: When necessary for the execution of services contracted by you (e.g., hosting services or email marketing tools)

rights.title: Data Subject Rights (according to the LGPD)
rights.description: Your rights regarding your personal data.
rights.intro: You have the following rights in relation to your personal data:
rights.delete: Request the anonymization, blocking or deletion of unnecessary data
rights.deletion: Request the deletion of your data (when applicable)
rights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us via email:

retention.title: Data Retention and Storage
retention.description: How long we keep your data.
retention.content: Your data will be stored only for the time necessary for the purposes described in this Policy or in accordance with legal obligations.

security.title: Information Security
security.content: We adopt appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, alteration or destruction.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description: Our use of cookies and similar technologies.
cookies.usage: We use cookies to improve navigation and understand how visitors interact with our website.
cookies.disable: You can disable cookies directly in your browser settings.

changes.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Policy from time to time. We recommend that you review it periodically.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: How to reach us with questions.
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights under the LGPD, please contact:

content.introduction: The protection of your personal data is very important to us. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect the information of users who visit our website
